tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great service ... Always available on phone call ,answers all the questions you ask with lots of patience

I have taken online video consultation with Dr. P.Chandra Shekar for my self. The consultation was on time and doctor was speaking very well with me, doctor has answered for all my question and the experience was good. I would like to recommend this doctor for other also.

I wouldn't recommend video consultation because it's audio call. Technology has advanced and i have done more than 10 video consultations in the past. This was one of the negative experience. Doctor didn't see the patient or even try to diagnose him. Over a call, he was more inclined towards two things. Continue the same medicine and take him to hospital for a physical diagnosis. Since the patient is on a wheel chair it's difficult to take him out so we chose video consultation. Secondly it's well understood that we are continuing the same old medicine. I don't expect to hear neuro specialist saying this even before swing the previous prescription which was written by a general physician . My video consultation was mis leading and not actually a video call.  When I asked the same question doctor realized that he must do a video call to examine the patient after all the recommendation was shared. ** **** ****** * ***** **** *** *** **** ** ** *** ******* * ***** *** *** *** So what was the end result - nothing.
Did i pay for the service - yes. 
Will i again consult home no
Do i recommend the doctor to anyone- ******** *** ****** not at all
Diagnosed the patient - No
